Package com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swing.adapter

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSwingMainMenuView
    The class AbstractSwingMainMenuView is used for the common parts of swing menu creation.
    ButtonHandlerSwingButtonAdapter
    The class ButtonHandlerSwingButtonAdapter is an adapter between ButtonHandler and JButton.
    ButtonHandlerWindowCloseAdapter
    The class ButtonHandlerWindowCloseAdapter is an adapter between ButtonHandler and JDialog.
    ClickHandlerSwingActionListenerAdapter
    The class ClickHandlerSwingActionListenerAdapter is an adapter between ClickHandler and ActionListener.
    HideableButtonHandlerSwingButtonAdapter  
    HideableCaptionButtonHandlerSwingButtonAdapter  
    ImageHandlerSwingButtonAdapter
    The class ImageHandlerSwingButtonAdapter is an adapter between JButton and ImageHandler.
    ImageHandlerSwingLabelAdapter
    The class ImageHandlerSwingLabelAdapter is an adapter between JLabel and ImageHandler.
    MainMenuToolbarViewSwingAdapter
    The class MainMenuToolbarViewSwingAdapter creates a Java SDK menu on a swing JToolBar.
    MainMenuViewSwingAdapter
    The class MainMenuViewSwingAdapter creates a Java SDK menu on a swing JMenu.
    MnemonicCharUtil
    The class MnemonicCharUtil is used to clean the mnemonic char (&) from text and extract the char from text.
    MultiSelectionListHandlerSwingListAdapter
    The class MultiSelectionListHandlerSwingListAdapter is used to adapt a MultiSelectionListHandler interface to a JList.
    NamedButtonHandlerSwingButtonAdapter
    The class NamedButtonHandlerSwingButtonAdapter is used to adapt a TextHandlerNamedHandlerAdapter to a JButton.
    NamedToggleSwingToggleButtonAdapter
    The class NamedToggleSwingToggleButtonAdapter is used to adapt a NamedHandler with ToggleHandler to a JToggleButton.
    ProgressHandlerSwingProgressAndLabelAdapter
    The class ProgressHandlerSwingProgressAndLabelAdapter is used to adapt a ProgressHandler to a JProgressBar and a JLabel.
    RadioButtonCellEditor  
    RadioButtonCellRanderer  
    ReadOnlyTableCellEditor  
    SingleSelectionListHandlerSwingJComboBoxAdapter
    The class SingleSelectionListHandlerSwingJComboBoxAdapter is used to adapt a SingleSelectionListHandler to a JComboBox.
    SingleSelectionListHandlerSwingJListAdapter
    The class SingleSelectionListHandlerSwingJListAdapter is used to adapt a SingleSelectionListHandler to a JComboBox.
    SummaryElementHandlerAdapter  
    SwingAdapterFactory
    A factory for creating Acrolinx Java SDK adapters for swing objects.
    TextHandlerSwingDialogAdapter
    The class TextHandlerSwingDialogAdapter is used to adapt a JDialog to a TextHandler for setting the title.
    TextHandlerSwingLabelAdapter
    The class TextHandlerSwingLabelAdapter adapts a ColorableTextHandler to a JLabel.
    TextHandlerSwingTextComponentAdapter
    The class TextHandlerSwingTextComponentAdapter is an adapter between JTextComponent and TextHandler.
    TextHandlerSwingTitledBorderAdapter
    The class TextHandlerSwingTitledBorderAdapter adapts a TitledBorder to a TextHandler setting the title.
    TextPaneRightClickMouseAdapter
    The TextPaneRightClickMouseAdapter is a MouseAdapter for a JTextPane and a DocumentSession to set the caret to the correct position and show a popup if needed.
